assignments.description: Set Order Activate Order = true if any blocks needed for gen2 in future

decisions.description: This previously blocked orders for activation where Activation Block Source is NOT null (for gen2 orders). We're removing this block now.

Flow.description: CH: 2022/08/17 Changed OrderEmailNotification formula. DB: 2022/08/22 Added Custom Pricing Method Assign Logic. CH: 2022/08/24 Added Courier Information Assignment. DB: 2022/08/31 Removed the Private Individual Pause logic. CH: 2022/09/16 Fixed logic for setting ship by date CH: 2022/09/20 Added logic to remove .txt from external order ID CH: 2022/09/22 Added assignment for additional courier information CH: 2022/09/27 Now passing ImportOrder to SuccessorUpdate apex action SP: 2022/10/11 Add Error check for inactive pricebook entries DB : 2022/10/14 Added CourierWholeSaleId Shipping Cost Exempt assignment check and map maxQuantity from Product onto OrderProduct DB: 2022/10/17 Removed the OrderItem Reference formula saved onto the OrderItem CH: 2022/10/18 Added Pallet Registration Number assignment DB: 2022/10/24 OrderItemReference assignment update DB: 2022/11/10 Save User details (Name, Email, School Number, CustomerOrderType) to Order to see Ordered By CH: 2022/11/30 Added in new ship to attention of and bill to attention of logic (if blank on import order, fetch from accounts) DB: 2022/12/20 Added PaymentCreationDate mapping to Order from Order Header & set block if ActivationBlockSource__c has a value CH: 2023/02/06 Removed ActivationBlockSource__c = true (still there, just set it to false) CH: 2023/02/20 Added delivery phone and delivery email mapping SP: 2023/02/20 Added ImportItemGroupEAN mapping CH: 2023/03/28 Changed OrderNotificationEmail logic and added in logic for OrderNotificationEmail2 CH: 2023/04/04 Added delivery email and phone logic CH: 2023/04/14 Set Invoicing Frequency to Daily for Private Individuals CH: 2023/04/18 Added DUD Order assignment CH: 2023/04/21 Added DUD Order manual discount assignment DB: 2023/05/31 Updates the Import Location searches on how the Account is found and assigned CH: 2023/06/01 Changed a decision for Trade (changed an equals to Contains)

formulas.description: If Email__c on import order is filled, use this value - else, get the email value (Billing Reminder) from the account
formulas.name: OrderBillingEmail

formulas.description: If Email__c on import order is filled, use this value - else, get the email value (Ship To Email) from the account
formulas.name: OrderEmailNotification

formulas.description: If Email__c on import order is filled, use this value - else, get the email value (Order Invoice) from the account
formulas.name: OrderInvoiceEmail

formulas.description: This formula calculates the total VAT of an Import Order Product record
formulas.name: OrderItemTotalVAT

Flow.label: Import Order Handler

recordLookups.description: This get takes the Communication Language on the Import Order and get the metadata record mapped to the expected value to retrieve the valid picklist value that is used on the Account
